attributes.action: Stop parking charges at the Pingles Leisure Park, Nuneaton
attributes.additional_details:
Official petition to stop parking charges being inforced at the Pingles Leisure Park, Nuneaton, Warwickshire.

We call on the goverment to review this scheme, taking into consideration the local sports clubs and school events that take place at the park. Including the improvment of olympic sport legancy within the area.
